text: Alexander Vladimirovich Gusev (; 21 January 1947 â€“ 22 July 2020) was a Russian Soviet ice hockey player. He participated at the 1976 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck, where the Soviet team won the gold medal. He was born in Moscow. Vladimirovich Gusev died on 22 July 2020, aged 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian ice hockey players Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Alexander Gusev (ice hockey)
